translations: adv.可以测定的程度；可视地

phrs.translation: 适度地, 可以测定的程度, 可目视地

sentences.sentence: Working conditions have changed measurably in the last ten years.
sentences.translation: 十年来，工作环境有了明显的改变。

sentences.sentence: Employees who participate in corporate fitness programs are not measurably less healthy than people who exercise on their own.
sentences.translation: 参加公司健身计划的员工并不比独自锻炼的员工健康多少。

sentences.sentence: In many ways, in fact, they are measurably better.
sentences.translation: 其实，从许多方面来看，现在(的局势)比25年前要好得多。
